introduction: SYNOPSISWu-pyung has doubts as to his wife Ha-jung's chastity so their marriage is an unhappy one. Wu-pyung carries on an affair with a young woman named In-suk. On their honeymoon, Ha-jung misunderstands the relationship between her husband and Mrs. Ji. Ha-jung wanders about the streets and runs into Im Kyu-ha who loved her during their school days. She drinks herself unconscious. When Ha-jung wakes up from her stupor, she is taken to a police station for violating the curfew. Tensions grow higher between the couple and Ha-jung ends up going to her parents. Ha-jung witnesses an encounter between her husband and In-suk by chance. When Ha-jung learns that Hye-jung had been following them, she falls into a faint. Meanwhile, Wu-pyung runs into Kyu-ha to get into a fight and wanders aimlessly. When he learns that Ha-jung is pregnant, Wu-pyung finally realizes her fidelity and runs to her side.故事Woopyeong熊对婚姻wonmanchi的纯度疑问hajeong能够继续约会女孩叫insuk。河贞恩误导信号是否woopyeong太太旅行时并满足imgyu和游荡的他心爱的学生时代满街都是无意识满足。他发现自己在河贞恩imgyu前夜睡打破了尴尬的一个饮料和不会感到奇怪的关系与我空出的违反宵禁去派出所。双方冲突不断升级河贞恩去我的父母。海·晶河贞恩却意外见证了woopyeong insuk遭遇难过地听到，一个跟在他们后面。该woopyeong丢失，并争取满足gyuha听到怀孕hajeong的消息最终实现团聚的心脏。
